channel.title: Weird Crashing Problem [Pi]
channel.description:
Hi, so my problem is whenever my server turns off without a prompt, such as power outage or is turned off i just get an error connecting to server whenever i try to connect through the client. Yes im running the server and yes it was working before it shutdown.
The only fix i've found for this is completely re-doing the whole server. Does anyone have any other fix's for this?
Thanks guys

item.title: Weird Crashing Problem [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

Powers off? Servers off? You can’t connect durr.

Read full topic
